title: Global organic chocolate market size 2012 to 2018
yAxis: Market size in million U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows the Market of size million U.S. in Global 2012 and 2018 .
In 2018 , there were a total of 886 organic size million in Global .
gold: The global organic chocolate market was projected to grow in size from 734 million U.S. dollars to 886 million U.S. dollars between 2012 and 2018.
As such , organic chocolate seems to have increased in popularity in recent years.

Organic Chocolate Candy A bar of organic chocolate may seem indistinguishable from a bar of regular chocolate ; the biggest difference between the two is that organic chocolate is made from cocoa beans grown without the use of synthetic pesticides or herbicides , as well as with organic sugar and milk .
